results.definition: tufted evergreen perennial herb having spikes of tiny white flowers and glossy green round to heart-shaped leaves that become coppery to maroon or purplish in fall
(astronomy) a collection of star systems; any of the billions of systems each having many stars and nebulae and dust
examples: `extragalactic nebula' is a former name for `galaxy'

results.definition: a splendid assemblage (especially of famous people)
